base_description: Rectangular gray cabinet with a modern style.
part_description: One drawer at the top, one larger cabinet door below, both with simple panel designs.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides open and closed within the top section, while the cabinet door swings outward on hinges to access the interior storage space.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed in kitchens or bathrooms, providing storage for utensils, cleaning supplies, or other items. It interacts with users through the opening of the drawer and door for access.
